title: Invisible Ornn
body: I canÂ´t see Ornn in gameplay, what is happening? How can i fix this?

replies.body: I'm guessing you're on a Mac? According to the status page, the devs do know about that weird invisible Ornn bug and are still working on fixing that up. In the meantime, you should be able to put your Environmental Detail down to Low as a workaround.
Yes im on a Mac. Thank you!
